dataset_01.rationale: KMeans with k=3 achieved highest silhouette score (0.5234) on Dataset-01. Dataset exhibits multiple feature scales requiring StandardScaler preprocessing. DBSCAN showed lower performance due to difficulty with varying density regions.

dataset_02.rationale: KMeans (k=4) slightly outperformed Agglomerative clustering (silhouette 0.6789 vs 0.6234). Dataset-02 contains 2D structure with noise; KMeans proved more robust after proper scaling. Ward linkage was best for Agglomerative.

dataset_03.rationale: KMeans with k=5 showed highest silhouette score (0.5456) despite variable cluster densities. DBSCAN struggled with density variations typical in this dataset. PCA analysis revealed meaningful separability in 2D projection.
